USERNAME.TITLE: Username
USERNAME.MINLENGTH: Username must have at least {{REGISTER_USERNAME_MINLENGTH}} characters

RULES.MINLENGTH: Password must have at least {{REGISTER_PASSWORD_MINLENGTH}} characters
RULES.UPPERCASE: Password must have at least 1 uppercase letter
RULES.LOWERCASE: Password must have at least 1 lowercase letter
RULES.DIGIT: Password must have at least 1 digit

CONFIRM_PASSWORD.TITLE: Confirm password
CONFIRM_PASSWORD.COMPARE: Password and Confirm Password do not match

MAIN_PAGE.TITLE: Travel easily
MAIN_PAGE.TOP_DESCRIPTION: Connect with fellow travel enthusiasts and embark on unforgettable journeys together. Discover new destinations, share experiences, and create lasting memories. Welcome to a community that turns travels into adventures
